articles.description: The former EastEnders actress, 48, who previously revealed she would be getting facial reconstructive surgery on the NHS, shared a photo of her enjoying an impromptu dinner.
articles.content:
Danniella Westbrook showed off the results of her latest nose job in a new Instagram snap on Wednesday.

articles.title: Dear Coldplay, listen to Massive Attack and save yourselves from greenwashing - The Guardian
